Articles.Content: what biome locations on the mun and minmus have easter eggs? I want to know because i play on console so i can not get any mods to help.
Check out the maps here. You can choose which world to view and highlight the anomalies with the buttons on upper right.

The hunt for easter eggs brings me back to the game from time to time :-)

Do you know the mods ScanSat and eventually a waypoint manager ? They can help you finding these anomalies through "in game research" if you like it that way.

Edit. Oh, i didn't know there are no mods for console ... sorry.

Edited December 22, 2018 by Green Baron
